products.name: Tree 1
products.water: Allow the soil to dry out completely before watering.
products.tips: Gently insert a toothpick into the soil to determine if your plant needs watering.
products.description: A caudiciform plant with reddish and green leaves. Interestingly, the leaves fold up in pairs during the evening. Keep away from children and pets.

products.name: Tree 2
products.water: Keep the soil moist but not waterlogged.
products.tips: Prune regularly to maintain shape.
products.description: A popular ornamental tree known for its lush foliage and hardy nature.

products.name: Tree 3
products.water: Water when the top inch of soil feels dry.
products.tips: Fertilize monthly during the growing season.
products.description: This tree is well-suited for indoor and outdoor planting, adding greenery to any space.

products.name: Tree 4
products.tips: Rotate the plant occasionally to ensure even growth.
products.description: A versatile tree that can thrive in various environments with minimal care.

products.name: Plant 1
products.water: Water sparingly, allow the soil to dry between waterings.
products.tips: Wipe leaves with a damp cloth to remove dust.
products.description: A small, compact plant ideal for desks or small spaces.

products.name: Plant 2
products.tips: Mist regularly to increase humidity.
products.description: A vibrant plant that adds a pop of color to any room.

products.name: Plant 3
products.water: Water when the top 2 inches of soil are dry.
products.tips: Use a balanced fertilizer monthly.
products.description: This plant features lush green leaves and is perfect for indoor decor.

products.name: Plant 4
products.tips: Trim dead leaves to encourage new growth.
products.description: A hardy plant that can thrive in a variety of light conditions.

products.name: Tray
products.tips: Use to hold small plants or gardening tools.
products.description: A wooden tray perfect for organizing your gardening essentials.

products.name: Soil 1
products.water: Ensure soil is moist before planting.
products.tips: Mix with compost for added nutrients.
products.description: High-quality soil ideal for a variety of plants.

products.name: Soil 2
products.tips: Great for container gardening.
products.description: Organic soil blend perfect for pots and containers.

products.name: Spade
products.tips: Clean after use to prevent rust.
products.description: A durable spade for all your gardening needs.

products.name: Duck 1
products.tips: Place in decorative pots for a whimsical touch.
products.description: A cute duck ornament to add charm to your garden.

products.name: Duck 2
products.tips: Use as a centerpiece in plant displays.
products.description: A decorative duck that brings a playful element to your space.

products.name: Duck 3
products.tips: Perfect for indoor and outdoor use.
products.description: A delightful duck figurine to enhance your garden's aesthetic.

products.name: Duck 4

products.name: Pot 1
products.tips: Ensure proper drainage to avoid waterlogging.
products.description: A sleek, modern pot perfect for indoor plants.

products.name: Pot 2
products.tips: Ideal for small to medium plants.
products.description: A stylish pot that complements any decor.
